channel.title: ReflectScape 639 | 20+ Bosses, Dicing, Torva/Pernix/Virtus, MUCH MORE!
channel.description:
[b]Our site:[/b] [url=http://www.reflectscape.tk]http://www.reflectscape.tk[/url]
Hey! We are a brand new server that is looking for new players! Since we are new we are looking for staff when the amount of players start to grow.
[b]Website:[/b] [url=http://www.reflectscape.tk]http://www.reflectscape.tk[/url] [b]Forum:[/b] [url=http://www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum]www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum[/url] [b]Webclient:[/b] [url=http://www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/webclient/]www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/webclient/[/url] [b]Download client:[/b] [url=http://reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum/showthread.php?tid=2&pid=2#pid2]http://reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum/showthread.php?tid=2&pid=2#pid2[/url]
Our Features: - 20+ Bosses! (Multi & Non-Multi) - 10+ Training spots! - Separate Skilling spots! - Full Torva, Pernix, and Virtus! - Fully working dfs, dclaws, godswords, and korasi sword! - Full Vesta, Statius, Zuriel, and Morrigan! - All Chaotic Weapons! - Special Donator zone! Much more!
We keep on working for more and more features. Come check us out!: [url=http://www.reflectscape.tk]www.reflectscape.tk[/url]
Some Screenshots: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wuqck0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/106avbm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/4h8rxe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1zqgc1s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/w9emtf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/neb9uc.png[/img]

item.title: ReflectScape 639 | 20+ Bosses, Dicing, Torva/Pernix/Virtus, MUCH MORE!
item.dc:creator: @vanzoest96 vanzoest96
item.description:
@vanzoest96 wrote:

Our site: http://www.reflectscape.tk

Hey!
We are a brand new server that is looking for new players!
Since we are new we are looking for staff when the amount of players start to grow.

Website:
http://www.reflectscape.tk
Forum:
www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum
Webclient:
www.reflectscape.heliohost.org/webclient/
Download client:
http://reflectscape.heliohost.org/forum/showthread.php?tid=2&pid=2#pid2

Our Features:

  • 20+ Bosses! (Multi & Non-Multi)
  • 10+ Training spots!
  • Separate Skilling spots!
  • Full Torva, Pernix, and Virtus!
  • Fully working dfs, dclaws, godswords, and korasi sword!
  • Full Vesta, Statius, Zuriel, and Morrigan!
  • All Chaotic Weapons!
  • Special Donator zone!
    Much more!

We keep on working for more and more features.
Come check us out!:
www.reflectscape.tk
